name: G+ Ultimate
description:
This style is based on the style 53423 by user 116833 but with some stuff added, this does not include the pony/cutie mark in the right down corner since it's replaced by a full background. This Userstyle can be updated normally through the userstyles addon.

Disclaimer:
I am well known about dropping projects, especially when I'm very busy so don't cry when I don't update. I'll try my best keeping this up to date, and I am in no way connected with google except by their services like search, google+, youtube ect. The base of the code is made by user 116833.
additional_info:
Features
-------------------------
- Adds a background to your stream.
- Adds a gradient at top.
- Adds lots of transparency on comment boxes and posts.
- Based on style 53423 with pony+ logo and Rainbow Dash background.
- Clean design
- Borders around peoples profile images on the profile page
- More to come

G+ Ultimate Changelog
-------------------------
v0.7b 22/12/2011
Had the wrong Google+ logo, it's all fixed now.

v0.7 22/12/2011
Fixed all the background errors, including the text box one.
Removed all the pony stuff.
Changed the new post edit button.
Removed the white background for the circles/tagged people when creating a new post.
Removed the games "advertisement" below the create a G+ page and moved it up.
Renamed to G+ Ultimate.
Fixed updating.
Removed the Invite Friends button.

v0.1
Internal release.

Known Issues
-------------------------
- Doesn't work any more since Google changed the code, needs to be updated.

Tested in
-------------------------
Chromium 17.0.929.0 (Working)
Firefox 8.0 (Working)
Firefox 9.0.1 (Working)
Google Chrome 17.0.963.12 dev-m (Working)
